data.title: Movies With ‘Man’ in the Title: Enough Already
data.meta_description: Movies With ‘Man’ in the Title: Enough Already
data.text:
There are too many!

Maybe you heard, but this Friday Iron Man 2 comes out. Last Friday, Paper Man was released. February had The Wolfman; March, Repo Man. At the tail end of 2009, A Serious Man and A Single Man joined the Oscar race. Later this year, there will be Solitary Man, Extra Man and the documentary Winnebago Man. Well, gee, that’s a whole lot of movies with the word man in the title! While this naming convention — Random-Descriptive Man — isn’t new (The Thin Man, The Third Man), it sure seems like it’s turning up more than usual. Because it is!

2010 has had by far the most Random-Descriptive Man movies of any year since 1990, and over those twenty years, the convention has become more prevalent generally. (This is counting movies that you might have heard of, not ones that were never widely released.) Plus, to add a little dose of lady-criticism, we checked how many Random-Descriptive Woman movies have been made in the same period. Guess what? Not very many! Maybe Wonder Woman, possibly, finally coming to a theater in 2011, will help rectify the gender inequity in movie titles. (Which, no joke, is real: check out all the Random-Descriptive Wife and Random-Descriptive Girl movies there have been.)

2010

Man Movies: 7, The Wolf Man, Repo Man, Paper Man, Solitary Man, Iron Man 2, Extra Man, Winnebago Man

Woman Movies: 0

Girl/Wife Movies: 1, Exploding Girl

2009

Man Movies: 2, A Single Man, A Serious Man

Woman Movies: 0

Girl/Wife Movies: 2, The Time Traveler’s Wife, The Astronaut’s Wife

2008

Man Movies: 3, Iron Man, Yes Man, The Other Man

Woman Movies: 0

Girl/Wife Movies: 3, My Best Friend’s Girl, The Other Boleyn Girl, Kit Kitteridge: An American Girl

2007

Man Movies: 1, Spider-Man 3

Woman Movies: 0

Girl/Wife Movies: 0

2006

Man Movies: 3, Wicker Man, Inside Man, Little Man

Woman Movies: 0

Girl/Wife Movies: 2, Factory Girl, The Dead Girl

2005

Man Movies: 5, Cinderella Man, The Weather Man, The Perfect man, The Man, Gingerbread Man

Woman Movies: 0

Girl/Wife Movies: 0

2004

Man Movies: 1, Spider-Man 2

Woman Movies: 2, A Good Woman, Catwoman

Girl/Wife Movies: 1, Jersey Girl

2003

Man Movies: 0

Woman Movies: 0

Girl/Wife Movies: 0

2002

Man Movies, 1 Spider-Man

Woman Movies: 0

Girl/Wife Movies: The Good Girl

2001

Man Movies: 1, Harvard Man

Woman Movies: 0

Girl/ Wife Movies: 1, Birthday Girl

2000

Man Movies: 4, Family Man, Hollow Man, The Ladies Man, Company Man

Woman Movies: 0

Girl/Wife Movies: 0

1999

Man Movies: 3, Bicentennial Man, The Best Man, The Minus Man

Woman Movies: 1, The 24 Hour Woman

Girl/Wife Movies: 0

1998

Man Movies: 1, The Gingerbread Man

Woman Movies: 0

Girl/Wife Movies: 0

1997

Man Movies: 1, The Sixth Man

Woman Movies: 0

Girl/Wife Movies: 0

1996

Man Movies: 1, Glimmer Man

Woman Movies: 0

Girl/ Wife Movies: 2, The Preacher’s Wife, The Rich Man’s Wife

1995

Man Movies: 1, Dead Man

Woman Movies: 0

Girl/ Wife Movies: 2, Tank Girl, Party Girl

1994

Man Movies: 1, Renaissance Man

Woman Movies: 0

Girl/ Wife Movies: 1, My Girl 2

1993

Man Movies: 2, Meteor Man, Demolition Man

Woman Movies: 1, A Dangerous Woman

Girl/Wife Movies: 0

1992

Man Movies: 3, Encino Man, The Lawnmower Man, Medicine Man

Woman Movies: 0

Girl/Wife Movies: 0

1991

Woman Movies: 0
